Mercury::EncryptionFilter

Mercury::EncryptionFilter Class Reference

A PacketFilter that uses non-modal Blowfish encryption from OpenSSL. More...

#include <encryption_filter.hpp>

Detailed Description

A PacketFilter that uses non-modal Blowfish encryption from OpenSSL.

Member Function Documentation

void Mercury::EncryptionFilter::decryptStream ( BinaryIStream &  cipherStream,
BinaryOStream &  clearStream 
)

This method decrypts data from the input stream and writes it to the output stream.

Note that the data may well have been padded when it was encrypted and you may have dangling bytes left over.

void Mercury::EncryptionFilter::encryptStream ( MemoryOStream &  clearStream,
BinaryOStream &  cipherStream 
)

This method encrypts the data in the input stream and writes it to the output stream.

The reason it takes a MemoryOStream as the input parameter instead of a BinaryIStream like you'd expect is that it pads the input stream out to the correct size in place.
